name: AH! Boo! de Bras
description:
3rd person games you play a hand that must pass the ring to the fingers of his sweetheart for that he will have to cross a table

A Game made in less than 48 hours with the theme "Alliance".

Control:

Left Click / Q:  Rotate Left

Right Click / D:  Rotate Right
